attributes.action: have the horrendously ugly 2012 Olympics logo changed immediately.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The official logo unveiled on 4th June 2007 was quite possibly the most horrendous image ever seen. It will definately go down as the worst Olympics logo ever. We urge the Prime Minister to have this logo (which cost £400,000) changed immediately.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
